YHistStretch.description: Y histogram stretch improves contrast by stretching histogram so that some pixels are shifted to dark and bright histogram ends

enableYHistStretch.description: This feature increases contrast based on Y histogram data

tempFilter.description: Temporal filtering of clamp and scale adjustments. The smaller the value, the more temporal filtering

yHistStretchZone.description: Triggers for Y histogram stretch parameters

zoneTrigger.description: Lux range to define one trigger zone for Y histogram stretch

zoneData.description: Y histogram parameters adjusted by triggers

darkBinThres.description: Desired percentage of dark pixels; upper limit

darkBinThresLow.description: Desired percentage of dark pixels; lower limit

satBinThres.description: Desired percentage of bright pixels; upper limit

satBinThresLow.description: Desired percentage of bright pixels; lower limit

darkTargetLvL.description: Target average value for dark pixels

satTargetLvL.description: Target average value for bright pixels

darkClampingMax.description: Maximum amount of clamping adjustment on the dark end of the histogram

yHistStretchZone.description: Triggers for Y histogram stretch parameters

zoneTrigger.description: Lux range to define one trigger zone for Y histogram stretch

zoneData.description: Y histogram parameters adjusted by triggers

darkBinThres.description: Desired percentage of dark pixels; upper limit

darkBinThresLow.description: Desired percentage of dark pixels; lower limit

satBinThres.description: Desired percentage of bright pixels; upper limit

satBinThresLow.description: Desired percentage of bright pixels; lower limit

darkTargetLvL.description: Target average value for dark pixels

satTargetLvL.description: Target average value for bright pixels

darkClampingMax.description: Maximum amount of clamping adjustment on the dark end of the histogram

yHistStretchZone.description: Triggers for Y histogram stretch parameters

zoneTrigger.description: Lux range to define one trigger zone for Y histogram stretch

zoneData.description: Y histogram parameters adjusted by triggers

darkBinThres.description: Desired percentage of dark pixels; upper limit

darkBinThresLow.description: Desired percentage of dark pixels; lower limit

satBinThres.description: Desired percentage of bright pixels; upper limit

satBinThresLow.description: Desired percentage of bright pixels; lower limit

darkTargetLvL.description: Target average value for dark pixels

satTargetLvL.description: Target average value for bright pixels

darkClampingMax.description: Maximum amount of clamping adjustment on the dark end of the histogram

touchEVScnMonitor.description: Touch EV Scene Monitor will reset the touch ROI if a scene change is detected

enableTouchEVScnDet.description: This feature will reset touch AEC ROI when a scene change is detected

thresLumaDelta.description: Scene change is detected if the absolute luma delta between previous and current frame is larger than this threshold

thresLumaAvgPct.description: Scene detection in low light will be triggered if deviation exceeds temporally averaged luma multiplied by this factor; the smaller the value the more scene change will trigger

minLumaAvg.description: Scene detection will trigger if the difference between cur luma and temporally averaged luma differ by more than this threshold

frameDelayBeforeStable.description: Number of frames luma needs to be stable for the algorithm to begin monitoring

temporalLumaAverageCount.description: How many frames to use in temporal average computation

CCTBasedExpComp.description: CCT-based adjustments to make dual camera exposures similar
